thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Linda Fogarty
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Linda Fogarty

author: Linda Fogarty
title: Linda Fogarty
text: I ordered shoes from mc Elhineys ,I got an email the next day to say they had been dispatched ,got a text from delivery company next morning with a 1hour window for delivery, the shoes arrived but too small I contacted mc Elhineys they arranged to have shoes picked up next day and within 4 days I had another pair delivered,I found this company very efficient very professional and the ladies I spoke to on the phone very friendly and helpful,highly recommend this company.
